lead_paragraph: India, a country notoriously slow to adopt new ideas, has now embraced the concept of day-night test matches and it will surely not be long before twilight five-day games are a regular feature on the sub-continent.

headline.print_headline: India Tickled Pink as Asia Warms to Twilight Tests
headline.main: India Tickled Pink as Asia Warms to Twilight Tests

snippet: India, a country notoriously slow to adopt new ideas, has now embraced the concept of day-night test matches and it will surely not be long before twilight five-day games are a regular feature on the sub-continent....
